Mike Pence denounced such tactics after the campaign, writing in an essay titled`` Confessions of a Negative Campaigner'' that`` negative campaigning, I now know, is wrong.'' It is wrong, quite simply, to squander a candidate's priceless moment in history, a moment in which he or she could have brought critical issues before the citizenry, on partisan bickering, Mike Pence wrote in 1991. That same year, Mike Pence became president of the Indiana Policy Review Foundation, a conservative think tank based in Fort Wayne. After years as a radio talk show host

Mr Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Mr Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. The changes come into effect on April 4.
